details.title: Intrepid digital microwave. A new approach to bistatic radar
details.abstract: Southwest Microwave, Inc. (SMI) introduced the world's first commercially viable bistatic microwave intrusion detection sensor in 1971. Bistatic microwave has become the paradigm for high security perimeters, and SMI products have become industry standards. With the introduction of the Intrepid Digital Microwave, SMI brings the latest in Digital Signal Processing (DSP) and power and data networking to this proven sensor technology
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
